snippet.title: The Stillness of the Wind Announce Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
One by one, everyone left the once bustling village for the city. Everyone, except Talma. Now approaching the end of her days, she maintains a simple, solitary way of life, surviving, subsisting, tending to her homestead and her goats and chickens.

Develop your own personal routine as you care for your farm and your animals. Tend to your goats, make cheese with their milk, collect eggs and cook meals, grow vegetables and barter with the travelling merchant who brings increasingly disturbing letters from your family in the city.

A follow up to the critically acclaimed Where the Goats Are, The Stillness of the Wind is a quiet meditation on life and loss.

Coming soon.

Steam page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/828900/ 

Website: http://thestillnessofthewind.com

Twitter: http://twitter.com/stillnessgame

TRAILER PRODUCTION 

Trailer created by Derek Lieu 
http://derek-lieu.com
@Derek_Lieu
